workflows.creator: 5fded9ad-cf9a-43e3-9b08-28bde8b87d6e
workflows.title: On NS Customer created/updated, create/update SF Account
workflows.description: Transfer information from NS Customer+Contact to SF Account+Contact

script-1.title: Account Type Map
script-1.description: Maps Customer Tier to Accout Type

call-workflow-2.title: Sync Contact
call-workflow-2.description: Call a Subflow to update the contact if needed

boolean-condition-1.title: Has something changed?
boolean-condition-1.description: We need to update the object only if there are changes. This is needed to prevent circular updates between NS and SF.

q.value:
SELECT custrecord_default_subsidiary_customer, BUILTIN.DF(custrecord_default_subsidiary_class) AS custrecord_default_subsidiary_class_display, custrecord_default_subsidiary_subsidiary 
FROM customrecord_default_customer_subsidiary WHERE custrecord_default_subsidiary_customer = {$.steps.netsuite-1.id}

salesforce-2.title: Upsert SF Account
salesforce-2.description: Copy NS Customer to SF Account

dependencies.name: Check if Sync is Enabled for the Object
On NS Contact created/updated, create/update SF Contact
Subflow sync NS Default Customer Subsidiary to SF
